message.body: HALP I just got two NIMH interviews for THURSDAY AND FRIDAY that's TWO DAYS PLEASE HELP ME
Woo go Liza!!!! I take it they are Skype interviews? I have a couple words of advice... Let me check my notes. And congrats!!! :) :)
Saw this and immediately thought of LizaÂ http://emogina.tumblr.com/
You guys should both start texting that to your respective significant others. And Lizzy to her dates. Sexxy
Hi! Do your notes say anything helpful? What were your interviews like...were they pretty straightforward?

I think it really depends on the lab. Mine were mostly "tell me about your experience" and then they told me about their research. Different PIs are different but my best advice is be really enthusiastic. Do you want to phone later? I can prob also email you some stuff
Erg tonight is really hectic. Maybe - I will let you know. Email is certainly good
